turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, can you give me a hand ordering some pizza for dinner?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, no problem. Where do you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm going to keep it simple and just go with Dominos.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, no problem. How many do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just 1.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Large please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, no problem. What toppings do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Go ahead and order it with mushrooms and peppers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, one large pizza with mushrooms and peppers?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. No problem. Should I charge it to your account?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I'm putting the order in now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds good. Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, the order is in.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. How long?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It'll be ready in 25 minutes and the receipt should be sent to your phone soon

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Excellent. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome.
